title: News. Views. Hughes - October 16, 2019 (15:00 ET)
text:
Washington has expressed "deep concern" over untrackable Chinese ships carrying Iranian oil. Beijing insists that its obeying all maritime law. RT America’s Rachel Blevins reports for News.Views.Hughes.

Former Florida state Democratic Party chair Mitch Ceasar and GOP analyst and veteran Eric Mitchell join News.Views.Hughes to discuss the decision of House majority leader Rep. Nancy Pelosi (D-California) to delay a vote on President Trump’s impeachment.

The House of Representatives is set to vote on a resolution condemning the withdrawal of US forces from Syria. Meanwhile, Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan is set to meet with US State Sec. Mike Pompeo and Vice President Mike Pence. Attorney and policy analyst George Higginbotham shares his insights.
description: Washington has expressed "deep concern" over untrackable Chinese ships carrying Iranian oil Beijing insists that its obeying all maritime law
